column5: The Master in Management is a 2-year (120 ECTS) program designed for local and international students holding a bachelor’s degree in any discipline. The Program is accredited and recognized by the Luxembourg Ministry of Higher Education and Research.This degree is dedicated to ambitious students who want to start their professional careers in Luxembourg and prepares for a wide range of areas, such as Finance, Tax , Accounting, Project Management and many more.Key facts about the
column7: For Students who do not need a Visa or Authorization to Stay in Luxembourg, the total tuition fees for the two-year program is EUR 22,000 For Students who need a Visa or Authorization to Stay in Luxembourg, the total tuition fee for the two-year program is EUR 24,000.
